job_description: Systems Development Engineer Intern Our customers’ system requirements are usually highly complex. Bringing together hardware and software systems design, Systems Development Engineering operates at the very cutting edge of technology to meet them. We design and develop electronic and electro-mechanical or systems-orientated products, conduct feasibility studies on engineering proposals and prepare installation, operation and maintenance specifications and instructions. We’re proud to deliver programs and products to the highest quality standards, on time and within budget. Join us as a Systems Development Engineer Intern on our OEM Product Group China team in Shanghai to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve As a Systems Development Engineer in OEM product group, you will be responsible for the customer request scope review, customization development, and tool development. You will work with the Dell global engineer team and the across-function core team members to deliver the unique solution to the end user. You will: Understand the Dell products design details and review the customer requests to identify the engineer actions. Build the configurations and ensure the function and quality of those unique configurations by following the test plans. Develop and optimize the validation tools. Maintain and update the test plans. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements Master degree, best in EE or CS major. Good communication and collaboration. Capable to work under pressure. Fluent English communication in oral, read and write. Desirable Requirements Hands-on experience with x86 system hardware. Experience in Linux and scripts. Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us. Application closing date: 31/7/2024 Dell Technologies is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment.
